propDescriptions.aria-labelledby: The id of the element containing a label for the grid.
propDescriptions.autoHeight: If true, the grid height is dynamic and follow the number of rows in the grid.
propDescriptions.autoPageSize: If true, the pageSize is calculated according to the container size and the max number of rows to avoid rendering a vertical scroll bar.
propDescriptions.checkboxSelection: If true, the grid get a first column with a checkbox that allows to select rows.
propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.columnBuffer: Number of extra columns to be rendered before/after the visible slice.
propDescriptions.columns: Set of columns of type GridColumns.
propDescriptions.columnThreshold: Number of rows from the columnBuffer that can be visible before a new slice is rendered.
propDescriptions.columnTypes: Extend native column types with your new column types.
propDescriptions.columnVisibilityModel: Set the column visibility model of the grid. If defined, the grid will ignore the hide property in GridColDef.
propDescriptions.componentsProps: Overrideable components props dynamically passed to the component at rendering.
propDescriptions.density: Set the density of the grid.
propDescriptions.disableColumnMenu: If true, the column menu is disabled.
propDescriptions.disableDensitySelector: If true, the density selector is disabled.
propDescriptions.disableExtendRowFullWidth: If true, rows will not be extended to fill the full width of the grid container.
propDescriptions.disableSelectionOnClick: If true, the selection on click on a row or cell is disabled.
propDescriptions.editMode: Controls whether to use the cell or row editing.
propDescriptions.editRowsModel: Set the edit rows model of the grid.
propDescriptions.error: An error that will turn the grid into its error state and display the error component.
propDescriptions.experimentalFeatures: Features under development. For each feature, if the flag is not explicitly set to true, the feature will be fully disabled and any property / method call will not have any effect.
propDescriptions.filterMode: Filtering can be processed on the server or client-side. Set it to 'server' if you would like to handle filtering on the server-side.
propDescriptions.filterModel: Set the filter model of the grid.
propDescriptions.getCellClassName:
Function that applies CSS classes dynamically on cells.

Signature:
function(params: GridCellParams) => string
params: With all properties from GridCellParams.
returns (string): The CSS class to apply to the cell.
propDescriptions.getDetailPanelContent:
Function that returns the element to render in row detail.

Signature:
function(params: GridRowParams) => JSX.Element
params: With all properties from GridRowParams.
returns (JSX.Element): The row detail element.
propDescriptions.getRowClassName:
Function that applies CSS classes dynamically on rows.

Signature:
function(params: GridRowParams) => string
params: With all properties from GridRowParams.
returns (string): The CSS class to apply to the row.
propDescriptions.getRowHeight:
Function that sets the row height per row.

Signature:
function(params: GridRowHeightParams) => GridRowHeightReturnValue
params: With all properties from GridRowHeightParams.
returns (GridRowHeightReturnValue): The row height value. If null or undefined then the default row height is applied.
propDescriptions.getRowId: Return the id of a given GridRowModel.
propDescriptions.headerHeight: Set the height in pixel of the column headers in the grid.
propDescriptions.hideFooter: If true, the footer component is hidden.
propDescriptions.hideFooterPagination: If true, the pagination component in the footer is hidden.
propDescriptions.hideFooterSelectedRowCount: If true, the selected row count in the footer is hidden.
propDescriptions.initialState: The initial state of the DataGrid. The data in it will be set in the state on initialization but will not be controlled. If one of the data in initialState is also being controlled, then the control state wins.
propDescriptions.isCellEditable:
Callback fired when a cell is rendered, returns true if the cell is editable.

Signature:
function(params: GridCellParams) => boolean
params: With all properties from GridCellParams.
returns (boolean): A boolean indicating if the cell is editable.
propDescriptions.isRowSelectable:
Determines if a row can be selected.

Signature:
function(params: GridRowParams) => boolean
params: With all properties from GridRowParams.
returns (boolean): A boolean indicating if the cell is selectable.
propDescriptions.loading: If true, a loading overlay is displayed.
propDescriptions.localeText: Set the locale text of the grid. You can find all the translation keys supported in the source in the GitHub repository.
propDescriptions.logger: Pass a custom logger in the components that implements the Logger interface.
propDescriptions.logLevel: Allows to pass the logging level or false to turn off logging.
propDescriptions.nonce: Nonce of the inline styles for Content Security Policy.

Callback fired when a click event comes from a cell element.

propDescriptions.onStateChange:
Callback fired when the state of the grid is updated.

Signature:
function(state: GridState, event: MuiEvent<{}>, details: GridCallbackDetails) => void

event: The event object.
details: Additional details for this callback.
propDescriptions.page: The zero-based index of the current page.
propDescriptions.pageSize: Set the number of rows in one page. If some of the rows have children (for instance in the tree data), this number represents the amount of top level rows wanted on each page.
propDescriptions.paginationMode: Pagination can be processed on the server or client-side. Set it to 'client' if you would like to handle the pagination on the client-side. Set it to 'server' if you would like to handle the pagination on the server-side.
propDescriptions.rowBuffer: Number of extra rows to be rendered before/after the visible slice.
propDescriptions.rowCount: Set the total number of rows, if it is different from the length of the value rows prop. If some rows have children (for instance in the tree data), this number represents the amount of top level rows.
propDescriptions.rowHeight: Set the height in pixel of a row in the grid.
propDescriptions.rows: Set of rows of type GridRowsProp.
propDescriptions.rowsPerPageOptions: Select the pageSize dynamically using the component UI.
propDescriptions.rowThreshold: Number of rows from the rowBuffer that can be visible before a new slice is rendered.
propDescriptions.scrollbarSize: Override the height/width of the grid inner scrollbar.
propDescriptions.selectionModel: Set the selection model of the grid.
propDescriptions.showCellRightBorder: If true, the right border of the cells are displayed.
propDescriptions.showColumnRightBorder: If true, the right border of the column headers are displayed.
propDescriptions.sortingMode: Sorting can be processed on the server or client-side. Set it to 'client' if you would like to handle sorting on the client-side. Set it to 'server' if you would like to handle sorting on the server-side.
propDescriptions.sortingOrder: The order of the sorting sequence.
propDescriptions.sortModel: Set the sort model of the grid.
propDescriptions.sx: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles. See the `sx` page for more details.

booleanCell.nodeName: the icon of the boolean cell

cell--editing.conditions: the cell is in edit mode

cell--withRenderer.conditions: the cell has a custom renderer

cellContent.nodeName: the element that wraps the cell content

columnHeader--numeric.conditions: the type of the column is number

columnHeaderDraggableContainer.nodeName: the column header's draggable container element

columnHeaderTitle.description: Styles applied to the column header's title element;

columnHeaderTitleContainer.nodeName: the column header's title container element

columnHeaderTitleContainerContent.nodeName: the column header's title excepted buttons

detailPanelToggleCell.nodeName: the detail panel toggle cell element

detailPanelToggleCell--expanded.nodeName: the detail panel toggle cell element

editBooleanCell.nodeName: root of the boolean edit component

filterForm.nodeName: the root of the filter form component

filterFormDeleteIcon.nodeName: the delete icon of the filter form component

filterFormLinkOperatorInput.nodeName: the link operator inout of the filter form component

filterFormColumnInput.nodeName: the column input of the filter form component

filterFormOperatorInput.nodeName: the operator input of the filter form component

filterFormValueInput.nodeName: the value input of the filter form component

editInputCell.nodeName: the root of the input component

iconSeparator.nodeName: the column header separator icon element

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

row--editing.conditions: the row is in edit mode

rowCount.description:
Styles applied to {{nodeName}}.
Only works when pagination is disabled.
rowCount.nodeName: the footer row count element to show the total number of rows

selectedRowCount.nodeName: the footer selected row count element

withBorder.nodeName: both the cell and the column header

treeDataGroupingCell.nodeName: the root of the grouping column of the tree data

treeDataGroupingCellToggle.nodeName: the toggle of the grouping column of the tree data

slotDescriptions.BaseCheckbox: The custom Checkbox component used in the grid for both header and cells.
slotDescriptions.BaseTextField: The custom TextField component used in the grid.
slotDescriptions.BaseFormControl: The custom FormControl component used in the grid.
slotDescriptions.BaseSelect: The custom Select component used in the grid.
slotDescriptions.BaseSwitch: The custom Switch component used in the grid.
slotDescriptions.BaseButton: The custom Button component used in the grid.
slotDescriptions.BaseTooltip: The custom Tooltip component used in the grid.
slotDescriptions.BasePopper: The custom Popper component used in the grid.
slotDescriptions.ColumnMenu: Column menu component rendered by clicking on the 3 dots "kebab" icon in column headers.
slotDescriptions.ErrorOverlay: Error overlay component rendered above the grid when an error is caught.
slotDescriptions.Footer: Footer component rendered at the bottom of the grid viewport.
slotDescriptions.Header: Header component rendered above the grid column header bar. Prefer using the Toolbar slot. You should never need to use this slot.
slotDescriptions.Toolbar: Toolbar component rendered inside the Header component.
slotDescriptions.PreferencesPanel: PreferencesPanel component rendered inside the Header component.
slotDescriptions.LoadingOverlay: Loading overlay component rendered when the grid is in a loading state.
slotDescriptions.NoResultsOverlay: No results overlay component rendered when the grid has no results after filtering.
slotDescriptions.NoRowsOverlay: No rows overlay component rendered when the grid has no rows.
slotDescriptions.Pagination: Pagination component rendered in the grid footer by default.
slotDescriptions.FilterPanel: Filter panel component rendered when clicking the filter button.
slotDescriptions.ColumnsPanel: GridColumns panel component rendered when clicking the columns button.
slotDescriptions.Panel: Panel component wrapping the filters and columns panels.
slotDescriptions.BooleanCellTrueIcon: Icon displayed on the boolean cell to represent the true value.
slotDescriptions.BooleanCellFalseIcon: Icon displayed on the boolean cell to represent the false value.
slotDescriptions.ColumnMenuIcon: Icon displayed on the side of the column header title to display the filter input component.
slotDescriptions.OpenFilterButtonIcon: Icon displayed on the open filter button present in the toolbar by default.
slotDescriptions.ColumnFilteredIcon: Icon displayed on the column header menu to show that a filter has been applied to the column.
slotDescriptions.ColumnSelectorIcon: Icon displayed on the column menu selector tab.
slotDescriptions.ColumnUnsortedIcon: Icon displayed on the side of the column header title when unsorted.
slotDescriptions.ColumnSortedAscendingIcon: Icon displayed on the side of the column header title when sorted in ascending order.
slotDescriptions.ColumnSortedDescendingIcon: Icon displayed on the side of the column header title when sorted in descending order.
slotDescriptions.ColumnResizeIcon: Icon displayed in between two column headers that allows to resize the column header.
slotDescriptions.DensityCompactIcon: Icon displayed on the compact density option in the toolbar.
slotDescriptions.DensityStandardIcon: Icon displayed on the standard density option in the toolbar.
slotDescriptions.DensityComfortableIcon: Icon displayed on the "comfortable" density option in the toolbar.
slotDescriptions.ExportIcon: Icon displayed on the open export button present in the toolbar by default.
slotDescriptions.MoreActionsIcon: Icon displayed on the actions column type to open the menu.
slotDescriptions.TreeDataExpandIcon: Icon displayed on the tree data toggling column when the children are collapsed
slotDescriptions.TreeDataCollapseIcon: Icon displayed on the tree data toggling column when the children are expanded
slotDescriptions.GroupingCriteriaExpandIcon: Icon displayed on the grouping column when the children are collapsed
slotDescriptions.GroupingCriteriaCollapseIcon: Icon displayed on the grouping column when the children are expanded
slotDescriptions.DetailPanelExpandIcon: Icon displayed on the detail panel toggle column when collapsed.
slotDescriptions.DetailPanelCollapseIcon: Icon displayed on the detail panel toggle column when expanded.
slotDescriptions.FilterPanelDeleteIcon: Icon displayed for deleting the filter from filter Panel.
